sentences.en: Anastigmatic lens : Photographic lens corrected for astigmatism as well as other distortions.
sentences.cn: 消像差透镜: 消除纵横像差和其他畸变的摄影用透镜.

sentences.en: Astigmatism can occur in addition to nearsightedness and farsightedness.
sentences.cn: 散光可发生在除近视和远视.

sentences.en: Choosing appropriate lens can reduce postoperative astigmatism posterior capsule opacification and maintain accommodation to some extent.
sentences.cn: 选用恰当的人工晶状体可以减少术后散光、后发性白内障,并保持一定的调节力.

sentences.en: Does astigmatism of 1 year old of children add myopic need to wear an eye?
sentences.cn: 需要,要不然的话,还会加重的!1岁小孩散光加近视需要戴眼睛 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does child astigmatism add myopic need to wear an eye?
sentences.cn: 小孩散光加近视需要戴眼睛 吗 ?

sentences.en: Eye problem. Congenital amblyopia. Long sight adds astigmatism.
sentences.cn: 眼睛问题. 先天性弱视. 远视加散光.

sentences.en: For moderate and higher astigmatism, PRK provides better accuracy and predication.
sentences.cn: :PRK治疗较高度数散光的疗效确切, 预测性强.

sentences.en: How is astigmatism OK do oneself restore A?
sentences.cn: 散光怎么样可以自己恢复吖?

sentences.en: Maybe you fall asleep in class because of uncorrected astigmatism.
sentences.cn: 也许你在课堂上睡觉是因为你的眼睛散光.

sentences.en: Morethan 33 percent were nearsighted andpercent had astigmatism , which causes fuzzy vision, the team reported.
sentences.cn: 其中大于33%的人患有近视,36%患有散光, 它们都导致模糊视力.

sentences.en: Myopic astigmatism is systemic sex disease actually.
sentences.cn: 近视散光实际上是全身性疾病.

sentences.en: People with a high degree of farsightedness along with astigmatism have less predictable results.
sentences.cn: 对远视兼散光的人手术后结果的预期较少.

sentences.en: They have what is called astigmatism.
Under astigmatism even narrow parallel light beams will not combine into one point.
sentences.cn: 有象散存在时甚至很窄的平行光束都不能会聚在一点.

sentences.en: With astigmatism objects appear stretched and distorted.
sentences.cn: 由于散光,对象出现拉伸和扭曲.

words.tran_cn: 散光的；乱视的；矫正散光的

trans.tran_en: difficulty in seeing clearly that is caused by a change in the inner shape of the eye
